amendment.description: Amendment includes a sense of Congress stating that hunger and obesity are impairing military recruitment and must be properly addressed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 111-498 to include a Sense of Congress stating that hunger and obesity are impairing military recruitment and must be properly addressed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 341 - 85 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 341 - 85 (Roll no. 312).
